title: "What is the evidence of initiatory wisdom in ancient Rome?"
first_phrase: The text explores the possibility of the existence of an initiatory center in ancient Rome and the traces of ancient Roman wisdom. Before delving into the history and myths of Rome and Italy, the author provides a brief explanation regarding the intense debates surrounding the critical historical questions of ancient Roman history. The author believes that some critics have gone too far in denying the reliability of Roman tradition for the regal period and the early republic, while a skeptical attitude would have been more appropriate. The last 200 tokens discuss the skeptical attitude towards the existence of an initiatory center in ancient Rome and invite readers to explore the visible traces of Roman initiatory wisdom.

last_phrase: In conclusion, while the debate between traditionalist and critical schools regarding the ancient Roman history still lingers, we recognize the importance of historical criticism.
